about_the_game:
Fix the world. Learn to code. Uncover the truth.

In Code Quest, you step into the role of a mysterious character tasked with restoring order to a broken digital world. Journey through diverse locations – from enchanted forests and futuristic cities to a cosmic space station and the heart of a computer itself – solving increasingly complex programming puzzles along the way.

With a unique Scratch-like programming interface, you'll learn fundamental coding concepts such as:

  • Building sequences of instructions

  • Loops and logical conditions

  • Managing variables and data flow

  • Optimizing algorithms

Every level presents a new challenge that requires creativity and problem-solving skills. As you fix the world, you'll watch it transform before your eyes, uncovering hidden secrets and mastering the art of programming.

Key Features:

  • Learn through play: No coding experience required!

  • Scratch-like interface: Intuitive tools to build and test your code step by step.

  • Diverse worlds: Explore forests, cities, space stations, and the inner workings of a computer.

  • Engaging story: Discover the mysteries of the broken world and your role within it.

  • Progressive challenges: Puzzles that grow in complexity as you advance, introducing new programming concepts.

    Code Quest is perfect for everyone – from beginners eager to learn the basics of coding to experienced players looking for a unique challenge. Can you repair the digital world and uncover the truth behind its fractured surface?

    Add Code Quest to your wishlist today and begin your journey into the world of coding!
